author: Drexel Lake

review: I was an early adopter - preordering two Chromecasts!  I have had a wonderful experience throughout the months.  I use PLEX to setup a home media server and with Chromecast I can watch movies and shows through Plex directly on my TV without any hassle.  No more cords to worry with!  Just be sure that you have a pretty strong wi-fi signal in your house.  I have noticed a few hiccups using it in areas where the wi-fi signal wasn't as strong.  Having the ability to mirror your screen has opened up the doors to be able to stream content through websites as well!Highly recommended!

author: Doug "Doug"

review: Simple and effective.  Seemless play on any TV that you can hook it up to.  Download the app, set it up, and your off to the races.  I use it a lot for Netflix and YouTube... innovative design and seemless linking.  I've experienced no lag or dropped synchronization.  It even has nice screensavers when it's not in use.  I've thoroughly used it.I wish it had more apps to synch with, but I haven't tried Google Play.  I also wish it was self powered and didn't require the extra plug in device to USB or a wall socket... makes it look a little funky, but that's all minimal.Buy one... for $30 bucks you're kidding yourself if you don't think its worth it.
